questions.content: You’re really busy at work and a colleague is telling you their life story and personal woes. You:

options.content: Don’t dare to interrupt them
Bubble with inner anger, but keep quiet
Explain to other equally impatient people in the room that the doctor is always running late
Complain in a loud voice, while tapping your foot impatiently

questions.content: You’ve been sitting in the doctor’s waiting room for more than 25 minutes. You:

options.content: Encourage everyone
Bubble with inner anger, but keep quiet
Explain to other equally impatient people in the room that the doctor is always running late
Badge into the office

questions.content: You’re having an animated discussion with a colleague regarding a project that you’re in charge of. You:

options.content: Look at your watch every two minutes
Don’t dare contradict them
Defend your own point of view, tooth and nail
Continuously interrupt your colleague

questions.content: During dinner parties at your home, you have a hard time with people who:

options.content: Ask you to tell a story in front of everyone else
Hang around you all evening
Talk privately between themselves
Always drag the conversation back to themselves

questions.content: This morning, your agenda seems to be free. You:

options.content: Know that somebody will find a reason to come and bother you
Heave a sigh of relief and look forward to a day without stress
Question your colleagues about a project that’s been worrying you
Pick up the phone and start filling up your agenda with meetings
